pr_title: Adding recipe for vanilla Gold Ingot -> Gold Dust conversion

timeline.message: Adding recipe for vanilla Gold Ingot -> Gold Dust conversion

timeline.bodyText:
No need to do new ItemStack() around the Slimefun Item, it would just create a wasteful object there.
Other than that, good for merging!
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText:
My previous comment wasn't targeted at the array initialization, they don't really come at any cost since an Array will be used internally either way.
It's this bit right here:
new ItemStack(SlimefunItems.GOLD_DUST)
SlimefunItems.GOLD_DUST is already an ItemStack, so creating a new ItemStack this way is redundant and creates an unneeded resource which is essentially just wasteful.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText: Apologies, I missed that part - I hope it's all good now!
replies.author: siaynoq
